# Conflict Rule 1 ## Avoid random deathmatch (RDM).
Players must have valid in-character reasons to kill or attack another player.
- [color=red][bold]Random, unprovoked attacks or killings (RDM) are not allowed.[/bold][/color] - [color=yellow]non-lethal conflict[/color] and [color=green]roleplay escalation[/color] are strongly encouraged. - Combat should arise naturally through roleplay, with meaningful interaction. - [color=yellow]Non-lethal options[/color] (such as capturing, negotiating, or detaining) are strongly encouraged to foster deeper storylines.
[italic][color=green]Conflict should be meaningful, and prioritize roleplay over random violence.[/color][/italic]
